quote: My first language, the true language of the soul spoken only on our planet of origin, had no word for betrayal or traitor. Or even loyalty- because without the opposite, the concept had no meaning.
quote_letters: MY FIRST LANGUAGE THE TRUE LANGUAGE OF THE SOUL SPOKEN ONLY ON OUR PLANET OF ORIGIN HAD NO WORD FOR BETRAYAL OR TRAITOR OR EVEN LOYALTY- BECAUSE WITHOUT THE OPPOSITE THE CONCEPT HAD NO MEANING
